text: Stefan Masztak (7 April 1927 - 4 October 2006) was a Polish sports shooter. He competed in the 300 metre rifle, three positions event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Polish male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Poland Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Vilnius Category:People from Wilno Voivodeship (1926–1939)
title: Stefan Masztak
